SEARCH

animatedarchitecture 0.6.0-SNAPSHOT API

Welcome to the Javadocs API for the AnimatedArchitecture project.

The AnimatedArchitecture API provides a way of hooking into the AnimatedArchitecture plugin. This allows you to control many aspects of the plugin, such as: Interacting with structures, react to events, initiate animations, extend the animated blocks, etc.

In this overview, we will introduce some of the key concepts you will encounter when using the Animated Architecture API. The documentation here is not meant to be a complete reference, but rather a quick introduction. It is recommended to read the documentation of the classes and packages you are interested in to get a better understanding of the API.

Animated Architecture Platform

Perhaps the most important class to know about when getting started with the API is the IAnimatedArchitecturePlatform. It provides access to many of the core features of the plugin.

The way to obtain an instance of the platform depends on the platform you are using. For Spigot, you can find an example in the Spigot core package.

Structures

The most important concept in the AnimatedArchitecture API is the structure. A structure is an abstract representation of a collection of blocks that can be animated. The most common representation of a structure is the AbstractStructure class, but there are representations, such a snapshots, immutable structures, etc.

It is recommended to read the documentation of the Structure package to get a better understanding of the structure concept.

Instead, you should use the StructureRetriever class to obtain instances of structures. The StructureRetriever class provides a number of methods to retrieve structures from the database.

When you want to make changes to a structure, you should use commands when making the changes on behalf of a player. If not, you should remember to synchronize the changes with the database. More information about this can be found in the Structure package.

Structure Retrievers

Structure retrievers are used to retrieve structures from the database. They are the recommended way of obtaining an instance of a structure. The retrievers are created using the factory class.

The factory allow you to create retrievers in a number of ways. For example, you can create a structure retriever from a structure's name, by its ID, or by its pre-existing instance.

The structure retrievers contain several methods to obtain the instance or instances of the structure(s) they refer to. For example, you can get a list of all structures they refer to, or only those owned by a specific player, or only get a single structure in case the retriever refers to exactly structure.

More information about the structure retrievers can be found in the retriever package.

Commands

Commands are the preferred way of making changes to structures. They allow you to make changes on behalf of a player.

More information and examples about commands can be found in the commands package.

Animation Hooks

The API includes two types of animation hooks that allow you to add custom behaviour either to the animations themselves or to the animated blocks that together make up an animation. More information about the animation hooks can be found in the animatedblock package.

Events

The API includes a number of events that allow you to react to certain events. For example, you can react to the creation of a structure, to the start of an animation, or to the deletion of a structure.

The way to use the events depends on the platform you are using. For Spigot, you can find an example in the event package for Spigot.

A full list of events can be found in the event package.

Packages
Package
Description
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.animation
This package contains the core logic for animating structures..
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.annotations
This package contains annotations used by this project.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api
This package contains various APIs used throughout the project, including definitions for animated blocks, colors, debugging, factories, highlighted block spawners, the platform interface, and more.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api.animatedblock
This package contains various interfaces and classes used to define animated blocks.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api.debugging
This package contains classes and interfaces used for debugging.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api.factories
This package contains various factories for creating objects used in the project.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api.restartable
Contains classes and interfaces used to easily restart objects.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.audio
This package contains the audio system used in this project, including audio animation hooks, audio set configurations, audio descriptions, and audio players.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.commands
This package contains command definitions and command factories used by this project, as well as various base command classes and interfaces.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.data.cache
This package contains classes that implement various caching mechanisms.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.data.cache.timed
This package contains classes that implement timed cache mechanisms.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.data.graph
This package contains all the classes related to graph-based storage such as the DirectedAcyclicGraph (DAG).
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.events
Contains interfaces and classes for handling events related to AnimatedArchitecture structures.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.extensions
Contains classes for loading structure types from external sources.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.localization
Contains classes for localizing text in the plugin.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.managers
This package contains managers that manage different certain aspects of the plugin.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.storage
This package contains storage-related classes, including storage interfaces, SQLite database storage classes, and more.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.storage.sqlite
Contains the storage implementation for SQLite.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.structures
This package contains classes that define, manipulate, and manage structures.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.structures.retriever
This package contains classes and interfaces related to retrieving structures from the database.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.structures.structurearchetypes
Contains interfaces for structures that define certain archetypes of structures.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.text
This package contains text-related utilities used for communication with users.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.tooluser
Contains the classes for the tool users system.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.tooluser.creator
The creator package contains classes that are responsible for creating structures.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.tooluser.stepexecutor
Contains the StepExecutor class and its subclasses.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.util
This package contains utility classes and interfaces that are used throughout the project.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.util.delayedinput
This package contains classes and interfaces related to handling and processing delayed input requests.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.util.functional
This package contains classes related to functional programming, such as versions of Function, Supplier, and BiFunction that throw checked exceptions.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.util.updater
This package contains classes related to processing project updates.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.util.vector
This package contains classes related to vectors, including various types of 2D and 3D vectors, as well as utilities for working with these vectors.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.util.versioning
Set of classes related to versioning of this project.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core
The AnimatedArchitecture Spigot core module contains classes and interfaces specific to the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.animation
Implementations of animation-related objects for the Spigot platform that do not use version-specific code.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.animation.recovery
Contains classes that are used to recover data from animated blocks in case they end up in a state4 where this plugin has lost track of them.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.comands
This package contains classes responsible for handling commands.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.config
This package contains classes responsible for handling the configuration files used by the plugin.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.events
This package contains implementations for all event-related classes for the AnimatedArchitecture plugin for the Spigot platform as well as utilities to call events.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.exceptions
This package contains custom exception classes for the AnimatedArchitecture plugin for the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.gui
This package contains all GUI-related classes for the AnimatedArchitecture plugin for the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.hooks
This package contains classes responsible for providing compatibility with various third-party plugins.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.implementations
This package contains classes that provide implementations for various interfaces in the core module for the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.listeners
This package contains all classes for event listeners for various types of events for the AnimatedArchitecture plugin for the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.managers
Contains classes that manage various aspects of the plugin specifically for the Spigot platform, such as redstone management and vault economy integration.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.util
Contains a set of utility methods specifically for the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.hooks.bundle
This package contains the bundle that contains all protection hooks.

nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.hooks.worldguard7
This package contains the protection hook for WorldGuard 7.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util
Provides utility classes that depend on the Spigot API and can be used by all modules for the Spigot platform.

Contains various APIs used by AnimatedArchitectureSpigot that need to be implemented by a sub-platform.

Contains a set of utility classes that provide compatibility with other plugins.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.implementations
Provides implementations of AnimatedArchitecture core interfaces that can be used by all modules for the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.text
Provides utility classes and Text implementations that depend on the Spigot API and can be used by all modules for the Spigot platform.

Contains all version-specific code for the Spigot v1_19_R3 platform.

nl.pim16aap2.testing
This package contains a set of utility classes and methods that are only used for the unit and integration tests in the other modules.
nl.pim16aap2.testing.logging
This package contains a set of classes and utilities to capture and test logs in JUnit tests.
nl.pim16aap2.testing.reflection
This package contains a set of utility classes and methods used for reflection.

The package contains general-purpose utilities that are not directly related to the AnimatedArchitecture project.

Contains some utility classes for generating code.

This package contains a set of utilities the for logging framework.

This package contains a custom backend for Flogger.
nl.pim16aap2.util.reflection
This package contains a set of tools that makes reflection lookups easier.
